original_text: He who is the Glory of Israel does not lie or change his mind; for he is not a human being, that he should change his mind.”
korean_text: 이스라엘의 지존자는 거짓이나 변개함이 없으시니 그는 사람이 아니시므로 결코 변개하지 않으심이니이다 하니

sentences.original_text: He who is the Glory of Israel
does not lie or change his mind
sentences.korean_translation: 거짓을 말하지 않으시며 마음을 바꾸지 않으신다

sentences.original_text: for he is not a human being
that he should change his mind
